synthesis_conditions.additional_information: For zinc complex 3, the initial nitrobenzene guest was exchanged for cyclohexane in advance of guest inclusion by immersing the crystals in cyclohexane.

materials.name: Inclusion of cyclohexanone (5) into a crystal of 2

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: A crystal of 2 was soaked in a drop of cyclohexanone at room temperature. After standing for 2 days, the crystal was analyzed.

materials.name: Inclusion of isoprene (6) into a crystal of 3

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: A crystal of 3 was soaked in a drop of isoprene. Then the vial was sealed with a screw cap and allowed to stand for 2 days at room temperature before analysis.
To a micro vial containing a single crystal of 3 and cyclohexane, a dichloromethane solution of guaiazulene was added. The crystal was heated at 45 ºC for 2 days.

materials.name: Inclusion of a chiral guest santonin (8)

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Santonin (8) was included into a crystal of 3 according to the general procedure.
Each PMF residue was transferred into a micro vial containing a crystal of 3 and cyclohexane using 5 µl of CH2Cl2. Incubation of the samples was performed at 45 ºC for 1 week.
Miyakosyne A (12) was included into a crystal of 3 according to the general procedure.
